long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Zap GPT - AI Text Assistant for Chrome: Smart, Real-Time Text Processing ⚡

Unlock productivity and creativity with Zap GPT, the Chrome extension that enables AI-powered text generation, rewriting, summarizing, and translation. Perfect for students, writers, and professionals, Zap GPT puts advanced AI, including ChatGPT’s capabilities, right at your fingertips.

⚡ Key Features:

- Instant AI Assistance: Highlight text on any web page, click the Zap GPT icon, and instantly access powerful AI tools

- Custom Prompts & Responses: Create personalized summaries, rewrites, translations, and more with customizable prompts

- Quick Copy Function: Easily copy AI-generated content to your clipboard for pasting into other apps or documents

- Adjustable Output Window: Resize the response window for a smooth and adaptable browsing experience

- User-Friendly, Non-Intrusive Design: Enjoy a sleek interface that integrates seamlessly into any webpage

⚡ How It Works:

- Install the extension
- Highlight text on any page
- Hover on the Zap GPT icon to access prompt options
- Get results instantly.

⚡ Why Choose Zap GPT?

- Boost Productivity: Choose the right AI model for deep reasoning, conversational flow, or specialized insights
- Versatile Applications: Ideal for students, bloggers, content creators, and business professionals
- Privacy & Security: All text is processed securely to protect user privacy
